NODE.title: Welcome to Everything!
NODE.field:
Congratulations! You have successfully installed the base Everything web engine!

For more information, you can visit the following sites:

  • EveryDevel.com - The main source of development information about the Everything engine
  • Everything on SourceForge - Report a bug, request a feature, join a mailing list, and submit a patch
  • PerlMonks.org - Experience enlightenment and learn perl while you're at it
  • The Everything Bible - Everything you wanted to know about Everything and more!

Also, if you have any bugs to report, cool tricks you want to show us, clarifications to documentation, or even some new documentation of your own, you can submit them to the Everything project

.
